attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we, the undersigned, petition the primeminster to sell all the assets of network rail to professional railway firms who will then be responsible for the operation of track & trains without government involvement. The primeminister will also, under competition law, ban any UK bus company from obtaining the freehold of the track. He will also ensure that the lines are split up into 6 companies based on area-East, South, West, Midland, Wales & Scotland.
